duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct genomics and quantitative genetics research in soybean breeding program.
Analyze historical data for publication in the area of genomics and quantitative genetics of soybean.
Conduct field work and work in an outdoor environment.
Analyze large datasets such as whole-genome resequencing.
Mentor students in the relevant field.

education_certification.credential: PhD in plant breeding, quantitative genetics, genomics, or related field
